page.title: 02SCOTHERN VILLAGE
page.content: {SCOTHERN { {SCOTHERN}is just in our D-block. It is in the North-West corner.It is smaller than{Sudbrooke}and about the same size as{Langworth}but has one shop whereas {Langworth}has two.Scothern has a primary school and a garden centre.In {Scothern}there are two churches.One is a Methodist chapel the other is an Anglican Church which is called St. Germain's.{Scothern}village also has a village hall and a playing field.There are some council houses too.Scothern is a quiet village with a beck running through the middle.
